page.title: 09LOWESTOFT PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: We asked our class which games they played in the playground. They said Tag, British Bulldogs, Football & Queenie-Queenie. For British Bulldogs, you have 2 home bases:the wall & the shed. The person who is on calls a name like "Alan" & Alan has 10 seconds to get from the wall to the shed. If he is not caught, we can all run to the shed. The catcher tries to touch as many people as he can. On the next run, if you were caught, you are on too. The game carries on until everyone is caught. In Queenie-Queenie, we stand in a line & the person who is "on" throws a ball over his shoulder. Someone in the line catches it & hides it. Queenie (the person who is on), tries to guess who has the ball when we say "Queenie-Queenie who's got the ball?"
